sentences.sContent: Every debt he owed in the world, including the pawnshop, with its usurious interest, amounted to less than a hundred dollars.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every debt he owed in the world, including the pawnshop, with its usurious interest, amounted to less than a hundred dollars.
sentences.sCn: 他在世界上欠下的每一笔帐，包括高利贷的当铺债务，加在一起也不到一百元。

trans.tranOther: a usurious price or rate of interest14 is unfairly high
